name: Ultraback
description: A small and fast retro styled Shooter about spaceships. It will only calculate your score and gets more difficult as time passes by. Press Y to shoot, Start by pressing X and Y together (Arrow Keys, X, Y are the controls). Inspired from Space Invaders and Gradius. Please visit also my Account on Scratch to enhance gaming experience. All the Graphics, Sounds and Music are created by myself, but the Menu screen music is from the Legend of Zelda. Try to find out the cheat codes (combinations of 4 letters and Numbers).
